title: System.DllNotFoundException: Unable to load shared library 'libSkiaSharp' or one of its dependencies error while publish the application throw azure app service on Linux
body:
**Description**

System.DllNotFoundException: Unable to load shared library 'libSkiaSharp' or one of its dependencies error while publishing the application throw azure app service on Linux. But the same sample doesn't produce any issues while publishing through azure app service. 

**Code**

<!-- a snippet of code that demonstrates the issue -->

**Expected Behavior**

There should not be an exception

**Actual Behavior**

System.DllNotFoundException: Unable to load shared library 'libSkiaSharp' or one of its dependencies error 

**Reproduction Link**
https://www.syncfusion.com/downloads/support/directtrac/general/ze/WebApplication1_(2)-1689441087
